statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed 's|.*/||'); cost=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_cost_usd // 0'); in_tok=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens // 0'); out_tok=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens // 0'); ctx_size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size // 200000'); pct=$(( (in_tok + out_tok) * 100 / ctx_size )); printf "\e[36m[\e[0m\e[37m%s\e[0m\e[36m]\e[0m \e[32mas\e[0m \e[37m%s\e[0m \e[32min\e[0m \e[33;1m%s\e[0m \e[32mon\e[0m \e[36m(%s)\e[0m \e[90m│\e[0m \e[35mctx:\e[0m %d%% \e[90m│\e[0m \e[33m$:\e[0m %.3f" "$(hostname -s)" "$(whoami)" "$dir" "$model" "$pct" "$cost"
